title: Services for enhancing the innovation management capacity of SMEís  in the Spanish regions of Asturias, Cantabria, Castilla y LeÛn and Galicia
objective:
This action shall provide specialized consulting services addressing innovation management capacity to SMEs with significant innovation activities. 
Beneficiaries of the SME instrument will receive support to enhance their innovation management and advice about the coaching process.
The most innovative SME within the regions of Asturias, Cantabria, Castilla y LeÛn and Galicia will receive and advanced innovation assessment based on the Improve tool and an action plan to fulffill the gaps.
coordinator: FUNDACION PARA EL FOMENTO EN ASTURIAS DE LA INVESTIGACION CIENTIFICA APLICADA Y TECNOLOGIA
participants: INSTITUTO DE DESARROLLO ECONOMICO DEL PRINCIPADO DE ASTURIAS;SOCIEDAD PARA EL DESARROLLO REGIONAL DE CANTABRIA SA;AXENCIA GALEGA DE INNOVACION;FUNDACION SERVICIOS EMPRESARIALES CEOE-CEPYME CANTABRIA;INSTITUTO PARA LA COMPETITIVIDAD EMPRESARIAL DE CASTILLA Y LEON;PARQUE TECNOLOXICO DE GALICIA SA;FEDERACION ASTURIANA DE EMPRESARIOS;CAMARA OFICIAL DE COMERCIO INDUSTRIA Y NAVEGACION DE CANTABRIA
